bill.title: Relating to just culture model in the provision of services to children in care.
bill.description: Permits Department of Human Services to require specified providers to submit corrective action plan in lieu of investigating report of suspected abuse of child in care in certain circumstances. Permits Department of Human Services to require specified providers to submit corrective action plan in lieu of investigating report of suspected abuse of child in care in certain circumstances. Modifies description of when report of suspected abuse of child in care may be found unsubstantiated. Directs System of Care Advisory Council to establish and administer grant program for purpose of providing just culture model training. Appropriates moneys for grant program. Directs System of Care Advisory Council to establish and administer grant program for purpose of providing trauma-informed practices and clinical best practices training to workforce providing residential services to children in care. Appropriates moneys for grant program.

history.action: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
